title: Fix LeaverBuster
body:
So just about 30 minutes ago i played a game and about 5 minutes in my internet provider cut out. It wasn't just me, it was the whole neighbourhood. So about 10 minutes later i joined the game after getting it fixed, and we won. We went fine, and my team was fine without me. But i get back into post game menu and i get a leaverbuster queue. Now, nearly everyday i get on Discord with my (irl) friends and we play for fun. My friends will now not queue up with me as I have this queue.

You need to actually get people monitoring your LeaverBuster system soon, guys, because if we have a good game or if the person comes back after a few minutes, they should atleast be able to check how the internet connection is working between my computer and RIOT servers.

I really want to play with my friends, and at the moment i'm getting toxic teams which make want to leave more.

Riot Pls

replies.body:
You wouldn't get a leaver buster for just one game. The system is tuned with the occasional DC or mandatory leave in mind, so to have received a punishment for this, likely you leave games fairly often. 

Understand that this negatively impacts nine other players every time, whether it is your fault or not, and if you are at the point of receiving leaver buster then you've run out of leeway, and the responsibility falls to you to fix the issues, be they technical or otherwise.
